alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 11:27AM CST until March 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.2 feet, State Highway J just east of County Road 206 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The river stage crested at 22.9 feet early Wednesday morning. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling until it levels off around 14 feet on Saturday. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Kaskaskia River Vandalia 18.0 20.3 Thu 11 am 15.9 13.8 14.1 13.9 13.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
